rules_text:
When Messy Decorator enters, target player mills three cards.
Decompose into Clue {1}{U} [i]({1}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a colorless Clue artifact with no mana cost and “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card,” and it loses all other card types. Decompose only as a sorcery.)[/i]
notes:
Changed name (to fit art), added art
+Ooze type
1/2 —> 1/3
Added decompose
